item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East at US-395/WA-20 Split
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East at US-395/WA-20 Split in Colville. Turn left for WA-20 East (3rd Ave.) to Ione and Newport.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East Approaching US-395/WA-20 Split
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East approaching US-395/WA-20 split. Use WA-20 East for Newport and Ione.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad St. Roundabout
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad St. Roundabout in Colville. Merge right for Railroad St. south to (Colville) City Center. Merge left to continue on US-395 south, which is incorrectly signed as WA-395.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad Street Roundabout
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East at Railroad Street Roundabout in Colville.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Entering Colville
item.description: Entering Colville on US-395 South/WA-20 East. Colville is the county seat of Stevens County.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Kettle Falls
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East in Kettle Falls

item.title: WA-25 South at US-395/WA-20
item.description: WA-25 South at US-395/WA-20 near Kettle Falls. Turn right for US-395 North/(WA-20 West) to Grand Forks, BC (Canada). Turn left for US-395 South/(WA-20 East) to Colville.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 230
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 230 - WA-20/Burlington/Anacortes.

item.title: WA-20 East at US-97
item.description: WA-20 east at US-97. WA-20 follows US-97 north from here. Use US-97 south for Wenatchee. Use US-97 north for Penticton (Canada).

item.title: WA-20 East at WA-215
item.description: WA-20 east to US-97 at WA-215 North to Okanogan and Omak.

item.title: WA-20 East - Loup Loup Pass
item.description: WA-20 east at Loup Loup Pass - Elevation 4,020 Feet.

item.title: WA-20 East at WA-153 South
item.description: WA-20 east to Okanogan at WA-153 south to Chelan and Wenatchee.

item.title: WA-20 East Approaching WA-153
item.description: WA-20 east approaching WA-153. For US-97 north use WA-20 east. For US-97 south use WA-153 south.

item.title: WA-20 East Approaching WA-153
item.description: WA-20 east approaching WA-153. WA-20 east heads toward Okanogan. WA-153 heads south towards Wenatchee.

item.title: WA-20 East at Cascade River Road
item.description: WA-20 East at Cascade River Road. Turn left on WA-20 for Newhalem and North Cascade Highway.

item.title: WA-20 East Approaching Cascade River Road
item.description: WA-20 east approaching Cascade River Road.

item.title: WA-20 East Approaching WA-530
item.description: WA-20 east approaching WA-530 to Darrington and Arlington.

item.title: WA-20 East/WA-9 North at WA-9 North
item.description: WA-20 East/WA-9 North at WA-9 north to Sumas.

item.title: WA-20 East/WA-9 North
item.description: WA-20 East/WA-9 North in Sedro-Wooley.

item.title: WA-20 East at WA-9 South
item.description: WA-20 east at WA-9 south to Arlington. WA-9 joins WA-20 east through Sedro-Wooley.

item.title: WA-20 East Overhead in Burlington
item.description: WA-20 east (Avon. Ave.) approaching N. Cascades Highway. Turn left to continue on WA-20 east to Sedro-Wooley and North Cascades Highway.

item.title: WA-20 East at I-5 North
item.description: WA-20 east at I-5 north to Vancouver, BC.

item.title: WA-20 East Approaching I-5
item.description: WA-20 east approaching I-5. Use right lanes for I-5.

item.title: WA-20 East Approaching WA-536 East
item.description: WA-20 east at WA-536 East/Mount Vernon. Continue on WA-20 east for Burlington and I-5.

item.title: WA-20 Spur East Approaching WA-20
item.description: End WA-20 East Spur at WA-20. Turn right for WA-20 West/Oak Harbor/Port Townsend Ferry.

item.title: WA-20 Spur East To I-5
item.description: WA-20 Spur East/To I-5 in Anacortes to Burlington.

item.title: WA-20 East at WA-525 South
item.description: WA-20 east at WA-525 South to Mukilteo Ferry. Turn left to continue on WA-20 east to Coupeville and Deception Pass.

item.title: WA-20 East - Keystone Ferry Landing
item.description: WA-20 east at exit of Port Townsend Ferry. Turn left for WA-20 East/Coupeville/Deception Pass/To WA-525/Mukilteo Ferry

item.title: WA-20 West - Port Townsend Ferry Exit
item.description: WA-20 west leaving the Whidbey Island Ferry. Turn left for WA-20 West/To US-101/Port Angeles/Olympia.

item.title: WA-20 East Approaching WA-19
item.description: WA-20 east approaching WA-19. Turn left for WA-20 east for Port Townsend and the Whidbey Island Ferry.

item.title: WA-20 East
item.description: First WA-20 shield on WA-20 east.

item.title: US-101 South Approaching WA-20
item.description: US-101 south approaching WA-20 east to Port Townsend.

item.title: US-101 North at WA-20 East
item.description: US-101 north at WA-20 east to Port Townsend. Continue on US-101 north for Sequim and Port Angeles.

item.title: US-101 North Approaching WA-20 East
item.description: US-101 north approaching WA-20 east. Use WA-20 for the Whidbey Island Ferry.

item.title: US-101 North Approaching WA-20
item.description: US-101 north approaching WA-20 to Port Townsend.

item.title: US-2 East at WA-20
item.description: US-2 east at WA-20 junction. Use right lane for US-2 east to Sandpoint.

item.title: US-2 East Approaching WA-20
item.description: US-2 east approaching WA-20 west. Use right lane for US-2 east to Sandpoint.

item.title: US-2 East at WA-20/US-2 West
item.description: US-2 east approaching WA-20 west and US-2 west to Colville and Spokane. US-2 east here is a one-way street.

item.title: End WA-20 East at US-2
item.description: End WA-20 east at US-2. Use US-2 east for Sandpoint; use US-2 west for Spokane.
